name: wdfn_theme
description: USGS Water Data For The Nation Blog

scripts.build: npm run clean && run-p build:* && npm run hash-assets
scripts.build:css: mkdirp static/css && node-sass --include-path node_modules/wdfn-viz/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/uswds/src/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/scss src/styles/main.scss static/css/main.css && postcss static/css/main.css -o static/css/main.css
scripts.build:fonts: mkdirp static/fonts && cp src/fonts/* static/fonts && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/fonts/* static/fonts && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* static/fonts
scripts.build:images: mkdirp static/img && cp -r src/images/* static/img && cp -r node_modules/uswds/src/img/* static/img && cp -r node_modules/wdfn-viz/src/img/* static/img

author: USGS
